text: ould have their treatment planned by a team of health care providers who are experts in treating cancer in children.     - Childhood brain tumors may cause signs or symptoms that begin before the cancer is diagnosed and continue for months or years.    - Some cancer treatments cause side effects months or years after treatment has ended.     -  Four types of treatment are used:         - Surgery     - Chemotherapy     - Radiation therapy     - High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell transplant
